action.action-desc: Ms. Collins (for herself, Mr. Donnelly, Ms. Murkowski, and Mr. Manchin) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the definition of full-time employee for purposes of the employer mandate in the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Forty Hours Is Full Time Act of 2015.
